links.title: China to cut import tariffs on wide range of products
links.description: BEIJING (Reuters) - China will cut import tariffs on textile products and metals, including steel products, to 8.4 percent from 11.5 percent, effective Nov. 1, the finance ministry said on Sunday. Beijing has pledged to take steps to increase imports this year amid rising tension with some of its biggest trade partners, such as the United States.

links.description: Smartphones are worth exactly how much people are willing to pay for them. With the release of each iPhone, tech journalists have broken down the "true cost" of how much each model is actually worth as a sum of its parts.

links.title: Apple stock rises after J.P. Morgan analyst initiates with bullish rating, $272 target
links.description: Shares of Apple Inc. are up 1.4% in premarket trading Thursday after J.P. Morgan analyst Samik Chatterjee initiated coverage of the stock with an overweight rating and $272 price target. That target is the second highest listed on FactSet.

links.title: Expected MM Moves W/E 10/5
links.description: The expected move that a stock makes is very important to know. The easiest way to get an idea of the move is to price a straddle at the close of trading on Friday. That is buying one call and one put at an ATM strike.
